Binance's Busy Day, Kraken's Second SEC Fight https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/11/22/binances-busy-day-krakens-second-sec-fight/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines TGZS5B5SBJDKFNG2E6LWJAVAO4 Nikhilesh DeBinance is paying one of the largest fines in corporate history to the U.S. Department of Justice, while its founder and CEO, Changpeng "CZ" Zhao, stepped down from his role running the platform as part of a settlement with multiple federal agencies. Meanwhile, Kraken is facing a lawsuit from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission that echoes the SEC's previous wave of suits. Wed, 22 Nov 2023 01:30:00 +0000 2023-11-22T01:30:00.153+00:00 PolicyopinionNewslettersState of CryptoRegulationsBinanceChangpeng "CZ" ZhaoCZDOJKrakenSECFinCENOFACFederal officials announced the various actions against Binance on Tuesday. (Jesse Hamilton/CoinDesk)
